text: Frederick John Robinson, 1st Earl of Ripon PC (1 November 1782 â€“ 28 January 1859) was a British statesman and Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (when he was known as Lord Goderich). == Titles == *Frederick John Robinson (1782 - 1827) *The Viscount Goderich (1827 - 1833) *The Earl of Ripon (1833 - 1859) Category:1782 births Category:1859 deaths Category:British Earls Category:British Viscounts Category:Politicians from London Robinson, Frederick Robinson, Frederick Robinson, Frederick Robinson, Frederick Robinson, Frederick Robinson, Frederick
title: Frederick John Robinson, 1st Viscount Goderich
